xwikidoc.title: Membership Request Confirmation for $space.displayTitle on Curriki
xwikidoc.content:
#** * Membership request confirmation mail template * @translate This page requires full translation * @type mailtemplate * @refactored ludovic *# #if($space) #set($groupName=$space.displayTitle) #end #if($membershiprequest) #set($memberName=$xwiki.getUserName($membershiprequest.requester,false)) #end
Dear $memberName,
This is a confirmation that your membership request to join $groupName is complete, and your request is now pending. The group leader for $groupName will review each membership request. You will receive notification when the leader accepts or denies your request.
Sincerely,
Curriki
